resources.string: Mahatma Education Societys Pillai Group of Institutions proudly presents \'Alegría - the Festival of Joy\' from the 28th of January to the 1st of February 2013 at Dr. K. M. Vasudevan Pillai\'s Campus, New Panvel. \'Alegría - the Festival of Joy\' is a multi-institution mega festival, created with the goal of providing a platform for students to demonstrate their wonderful and sometimes hidden talent and skill. Alegría which takes its name from the Spanish word for Joy, will be a fun filled and exciting inter collegiate festival highlighted by dance and music competitions, treasure hunts,mind games,technical and literary events, fashion shows, celebrity appearances, sports and community service initiatives. All the events are meticulously planned to help the youth to think, act and perform out of the box in challenging environments.

The Mahatma Education Society is proof of a vision linked irrevocably to national goals. Born in a\' time when education was deemed service, it set about bringing social and economic change through the\' proactive personal development of every child that came into its fold.

Pillai Institute of Information Technology, Engineering, Media Studies and Research (PIIT) seeks to\' develop in its students a sound technical foundation and to\' enhance the natural curiosity of its engineers. We believe that a\' successful engineer is one who complements his deep theoretical\' knowledge with an intuitive practical approach.
